name: Bundler – WooCommerce Product Bundles, Discounts and Dynamic Pricing
author: WooBundles

sections.description:
View Demo | Documentation with real examples | Ask Questions | PRO version | Community

BUNDLER FOR WOOCOMMERCE

Bundler for Woocommerce helps you create amazing product bundles, dynamic pricing, quantity discounts, volume discounts, buy one get one (BOGO) offers and much more to boost your WooCommerce sales.

It also displays the discount offers and bundles in the most intuitive way for your clients using beautiful swatches. Discounts will be visible in the product page, sales page, cart, checkout and order email notifications.

If you are a shop owner, focusing on increasing your Average Order Value (AOV) and Lifetime Value (LTV) should be your priority. Your clients should never buy only 1 product, and the way your present them with your offers is crucial.

Use Bundler to create:

  • Product Bundles
  • Dynamic pricing
  • Discount rules
  • Quantity discounts
  • Product swatches
  • Buy One Get One (BOGO) Offers
  • Quantity breaks
  • Upsells
  • Volume discounts
  • Compatible with CURCY multi currency plugin
  • And much more!

Start selling more and retain customers by creating irresistible promotions with the best product bundles, dynamic pricing and discount plugin for WooCommerce.

WHY BUNDLER?

With the advertising costs increasing more and more, eCommerce businesses are competing to win new clients every day, and the one who spends the most to acquire clients wins this game.

Here are some major benefits of using Bundler:

  • Increase your AOV (average order value) by offering discounts on bundles, quantity discounts etc.
  • Boost your sales with discount offers, dynamic pricing, quantity discounts and swatches. Create promotions your clients would feel stupid saying no to.
  • Increase your profit.

FREE VERSION FEATURES

👉 Check out the Live Demo Store

👉 For Marketing tips, join our Facebook group

✅ Create Unlimited product bundles, quantity discounts and special offers for WooCommerce simple products

Use Bundler to create unlimited special offers and discounts for your product: BOGO (Buy one get one), Buy X Get Y, Quantity Breaks, Quantity Discounts, Volume discount, Bundles etc.

See example here 👉 Simple product demo

✅ Set discount rules

You can set regular price, sale price, choose product quantity and add discount rules for each bundle offer to highlight the discount and saving.

✅ Dynamic pricing

When the client chooses an offer, the price will be dynamically and automatically calculated according to the discount conditions and rules, cart items etc.

✅ Use swatches

Bundler allows you to display the offers using beautiful conversion-focused product swatches.

✅ Add marketing messages

The way you present your offer is as much important as the offer itself. Bundler allows you to add marketing messages to make your offer more powerful.

✅ Customize the design

Bundler provides a variety of design options to help you choose different structures for your offers, edit the colors and the texts, in a way that fits your brand identity.

✅ Redirect to the cart page

If enabled, this option allows you to direct your clients to the cart page after they add a bundle to their cart. This can help you significantly increase your conversion rate.

PRO version

PRO VERSION FEATURES

✅ All the features of the free version plus

✅ Create Unlimited bundle offers for simple and variable products

Use the offer creation form on each product page to create unlimited offers for your product. Combine product variations to create bundle offers that get sales!

✅ Create custom variations

You can use WooCommerce native variations to create bundles, but you can also get creative and make your own bundle variations. The goal here is to make it a NO BRAINER for your clients to buy your offers.

See demo here 👉 Custom variants demo

✅ Add images for your product bundles

Illustrate the content of your offers by creating awesome product swatches and adding images to them.

✅ Preselect offers

Subtly push your clients to take a specific offer by preselecting it. Add specific marketing messages to make it even more powerful (Buy 1 get 1 free, Buy 2 get free shipping, etc..).

✅ Redirect to the cart page

If enabled, this option allows you to direct your clients to the cart page after they add a bundle to their cart. This can help you significantly increase your conversion rate.

✅ Redirect to the checkout page

If enabled, this option allows you to direct your clients to the checkout page after they add a bundle to their cart helping you improving the conversion rate and avoiding any distractions especially if you are using funnels.

✅ Compatibility with Price Based on Country for WooCommerce plugin

Set fixed prices for your bundles per zone and per currency by combining the Bundler with Price Based on Country for WooCommerce plugin by Oscar Gare.

✅ Compatibility with CURCY Woocommerce Multi Currency By Villatheme

Take your e-commerce business wordlwide by combining the Bundler with CURCY multi currency woocommerce plugin by Villatheme. 👉 Check out the Live Demo Store.

✅ Integrate with any page builder using a shortcode

Bundler works with most page builders like Elementor, Divi, Gutenberg and much more. By using the Bundler shortcode, you can add your offers to any sales page or funnel.

Learn more about Bundler

BUNDLER IS BEST FOR?

  • Ecommerce stores
  • Dropshipping stores
  • Physical products
  • Digital products
  • Dropshippers
  • Ecommerce brands

WHY US?

We are not a development agency (yet we have world-class developers), we are marketers and eCommerce business owners. Bundler was first built to fix the problem of low average order value for our own e-commerce stores. It was built out of need. And guess what? It works!

Bundler helped us 3X our profit in a few weeks by simply presenting the right offers the right way!

By releasing this plugin to the public, we truly believe we can help other marketers and e-commerce business owners to make more profit by building more intuitive offers.

Privacy Policy

Bundler Lite uses Appsero SDK to collect some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

Appsero SDK does not gather any data by default. The SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

Integrating Appsero SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how Appsero collects and uses this data.
sections.installation:
1. Install ‘Bundler Lite’ Plugin.
  2. Activate the Plugin.
  3. Go to your product admin page -> Offers & Bundles.
  4. Start creating offers.
sections.faq:
Why should I use Bundler?

  • If you are an eCommerce business owner, you should definitely use Bundler to: Increase average order on your store, boost conversion rate, outbid your competitors and increase your profit.

Do I need to have coding skills to use Bundler?

  • Absolutely not. You can create and manage bundles and offers without any coding knowledge. Bundler is the most beginner friendly bundle plugin on the market.

Is Bundler compatible with any WooCommerce Theme?

  • Yes, Bundler is compatible with any WooCommerce Theme including OceanWP / Astra / Flatsome / X-Theme / Divi… But sometimes it may require small css tweak.

Does it work on MultiSite?

  • Yes, it is.

Does it work for simple and variable products?

  • Absolutely! While Bundler Lite (the free version of Bundler) works for simple products only, you can upgrade to the pro version to use it on variable products.

Does Bundler work for digital products?

  • Yes! Bundler is a Woocommerce based bundle solution that can be used for both physical and digital products.

What’s included in the pro licence?

  • In addition to all the features included in the free version (Bundler Lite), the pro version allows you to create offers and bundles for variable products, create your own custom variations, show more marketing messages and preselect offers. Bundler Pro also integrates with most page builders and multi-currency plugins. Check out the full list of Pro features here

Is it possible to provide BOGO deals?

  • Absolutely! Bundler helps building BOGO deals in a 100% intuitive way.

How to setup Quantity Breaks?

  • Navigate to your product admin page and follow our step-by-step video tutorial.

I’d like access to all features. How can I get them?

  • You can get access to more features and support by upgrading to our Pro version. Purchasing a Pro license gets you access to the full version of Bundler, automatic updates and priority support.
sections.changelog:
= 2.1.5.7 (Feb 18, 2024)
* Fixed: fatar error when updating Bundler to 2.1.5.6

= 2.1.5.6 (Feb 17, 2024)
* Fixed: selecting a bundle offer when there are 2 options with the same product’s quantity.
* Fixed: increasing the size of the product_id in the database from 10 digits to 15.
* Added: Preselecting an offer is now included in the free version.

= 2.1.5.5 (Feb 5, 2024)
* Fixed: Fatal error in the checkout page.

= 2.1.5.4 (Dec 19, 2023)
* Fixed: some notices on the cart and checkout page.

= 2.1.5.3 (Dec 09, 2023)
* Fixed: some notices on admin pages.
* Added: show price per unit instead of total price.

= 2.1.5.2 (Dec 06, 2023)
* Fixed: Updating cart prices delay in some stores.

= 2.1.5.1 (Dec 03, 2023)
* Fixed: Warning message “Trying to access array offset on value of type null” on some stores.

= 2.1.5 (Nov 29, 2023)
* Added: Compatibility with WPC product bundles.
* Added: Compatibility with Villatheme CURCY free version.
* Added: Compatibility with Product Price Based On Countries plugin.
* Improved: Offers list design.
* Improved: Offer form design.

= 2.1.4 (Nov 11, 2023)
* Added: Bundler now checks the stock quantity before adding a product to the cart.
* Added: New design for offer creation page.
* Added: Create new offer directly from the left menu.
* Added: Compatibility with WordPress 6.4.1
* Fixed: Some styling issues.

= 2.1.3.6 (Nov 3, 2023)
* Fixed: Warnings on the checkout page on some stores.

= 2.1.3.5 (Oct 22, 2023)
* Fixed: Offers not saving on the offer creation form.

= 2.1.3.4 (Oct 22, 2023)
* Fixed: Go pro notice on offer creation form.
* Improved: Offer creation form design.
* Added: Preselect default offer is now included in the Lite version.

= 2.1.3.3 (Oct 18, 2023)
* Fixed: Dynamically change the price on single product pages when a bundle is selected.

= 2.1.3.2 (Oct 18, 2023)
* Fixed: Compatibility issue with CURCY (Villatheme).
* Fixed: PHP Warnings on some stores.

= 2.1.3.1 (Oct 10, 2023)
* Fixed: Redirect to cart page not working on some stores.
* Improved: compatibility with Woocommerce 8.2.0

= 2.1.3 (Oct 10, 2023)
* Fixed: Settings not saving on some stores.
* Fixed: minor css error.

= 2.1.2 (Oct 8, 2023)
* Fixed: Html error in classic design.
* Improved: CSS for classic design.

= 2.1.1 (Oct 6, 2023)
* Fixed: Bundles table not showing on the offer creation form.

= 2.1.0 (Oct 6, 2023)
* Fixed: Dynamically change the price on single product pages when a bundle is selected.
* Fixed: Link to the settings page not working from the plugins page.
* Added: Different design for desktop and mobile.
* Added: Redirect to the checkout page after add to cart.
* Added: Show the bundle price on the add to cart button.
* Added: Show/Hide the default quantity selector.
* Added: Change the colors for your offers from the settings section.
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 8.1.1.

= 2.0.4 (Aug 28, 2023)
* Improved: Compatibility with WordPress 6.3.
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 8.0.2.

= 2.0.3 (Aug 1, 2023)
* Fixed: Issue with calculating discount.
* Improved: classic design widget width.
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.9.0.

= 2.0.2 (Jul 18, 2023)
* Fixed: CSS issue with Shoptimizer theme.
* Fixed: Conflict with some plugins using Appsero tracking.

= 2.0.1 (Jul 12, 2023)
* Fixed: CSS issue with Gutenberg.

= 2.0.0 (Jul 12, 2023)
* Added: New offer creation form UI.
* Added: Possibility to disable/enable an offer.
* Added: Create multiple offers for the same product with different priorities.
* Added: Bulk edit/delete offers.
* Added: Search offers using keywords.
* Fixed: Frondend widget not showing on some stores.
* Fixed: compatibility with Rank Math SEO.

= 1.3.6 (Jul 04, 2023)
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.8.2.

= 1.3.5 (Jun 26, 2023)
* Added: Redirect to cart after successful add to cart (used to be a premium feature, now added to the free plan).
* Improved: Bundler widget template.

= 1.3.4 (Jun 19, 2023)
* Improved: compatibility with Woocommerce 7.8
* Added: plugin custom links.

= 1.3.3.1 (Jun 11, 2023)
* Fixed: Remove offer button not working on some stores.

= 1.3.3 (Jun 4, 2023)
* Added: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.7.2
* Added: Compatibility with WordPress 6.2.2

= 1.3.2 (May 9, 2023)
* Added: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.6.1

= 1.3.1 (Mar 28, 2023)
* Added: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.5.1
* Improved: Css width in classic view.

= 1.3.0 (Mar 18, 2023)
* Added: Compatibility with WordPress 6.2.
* Added: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.5.
* Fixed: Full width css in classic view.

= 1.2.9 (Jan 18, 2023)
* Improved: Compatibility between Bundler Lite and Pro.
* Added: Display a notice when Bundler is active for the first time.

= 1.2.8 (Jan 16, 2023)
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.3.

= 1.2.7 (Dec 28, 2022)
* Improved: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.2.2.
* Improved: tracking API update.

= 1.2.6 (Dec 20, 2022)

= 1.2.5 (Dec 15, 2022)
* Improved: tracking API update.

= 1.2.4 (Dec 6, 2022)
* Fixed: CSS issue with certain themes.

= 1.2.3 (Nov 25, 2022)
* Added: Compatibility with Woocommerce 7.1.0.
* Added: Compatibility with WordPress 6.1.
* Improved: Tracking license activation.

= 1.2.2 (Sep 24, 2022)
* Fixed: Using Woocommerce ajax instead of creating custom ajax url.
* Fixed: Mini cart update after ajax add to cart.
* Improved: Display Bundle price on the frontend.

= 1.2.1 (Jul 5, 2022)
* Added: Database versioning.
* Added: License activation form.
* Added: Hide quantity button when bundles are activated.
* Added: Dynamic views according to Free vs Pro version.
* Added: Notice on variable product admin pages.

1.2.0 (Jun 23, 2022)

  • Fixed Javascript bug.

1.1.0 (Jun 20, 2022)

  • Fixed security issue.

1.0.0 (Jun 19, 2022)

sections.reviews:
Horrible customer service

By alexbrand on April 2, 2024

Horrible customer service, offer preselection does not work correctly on variable products on the Woodmart theme. Support ignores this problem.

Don't Use IT!

By ayher on January 21, 2024

It's unprofessional and it caused "checkout -error-" in my woocommerce store.

I don't advise you to download it, It contain JS queries from the original Bundler app from shopify store, It's just a scam or resking plugin, they made a copy from the original app without updating codes. It takes me many days to know that It's the source of the problem, after deactivate it the problem was solved so I delete it definitely.

Best Bundl Plugin WP

By hazzeltorn on December 14, 2023

It's simple :

It's the best plugin for bundle atm on the market.

Simple, class, nice cutomized in pro version.
And the support is super fast and they always fix quickly the issue if any issue.

i higly recommend !

Top Support, Assistance & Plugin Quality

By zveuse on November 26, 2023

I had some issues with multicurrency compability with my plugin, they insisted to try to make it compatable and also helped me with all my questions, some custom code & more to make this fit my website & project at best.

Really impressed by the friendliness and openness to help me and that is why I am making a review over here, I am almost never doing reviews if there is not anything that stands out really well. Both the look and feel of the plugin itself and all the others mentioned are superior.

Thank you.

// Max. E

Don't buy this plug-in. You will regret it.

By taco0630 on November 15, 2023

Technical support was not helpful. Plug-in does not work at all on website, and Bundler insisted compatibility is not part of their responsibility.

You will never know if this plug-in works on your site seamless until you buy and install it. Then, you will find it is not working at all, and you contact customer service. Then, they go around, asking for all the access even including FTP access, come back after half month, and tell you they cannot resolve the issue nor refund.

If you want to experience the same, please go buy it:) Their customer service really helps you to explore the darkness of human nature.

Their technical support insisted no refund because of protection on intellectual property. The truth is there are so many competitors on the market who works better than them, so who gives it a fxxk? Whoever wants to join the market would do research on a stronger competitor.

In addition, this plug-in is not that hard. I don't understand why they could not do better debugging before they released.

Awesome support

By buschihh on October 23, 2023

They have an amazing support. Very quick in responding to my questions.

Support is brilliant

By dsecommerce on October 19, 2023

We are an ecommerce company running multiple stores in the European market. We tested many plugins, but this one stands out because of its features, especially how it allows us to sell bundled products.

Not only is the plugin great, but its support is brilliant. We faced multiple issues with our plugin setup, and these guys helped us along the way.

Great work, you have made a long term customer today!

The perfect solution!

By basclay on October 18, 2023

This plugin is amazing and the customer support is even better! 5/5

This is a game changer!

By annifiksu on October 14, 2023

After I left Shopify, I have been looking for this type of plugin for WooCommerce. The plugin I purchased 3 days ago, didn't meet my expectations, it wasn't what I was looking for. This is an appreciation comment about how amazing this plugin is. This plugin is amazing and RARE! I can't believe it took me forever looking for it. I found it on WordPress while searching for plugins and I was excited. It's gonna be a game changer. Regards to the brain behind it and other team members.

Amazing plugin and support

By cleeble on October 13, 2023

Moving from Shopify to Woocommerce, I was looking for a plugin to create native discounts and bundle offers. Bundler is exactly what I was looking for. Without hesitation I upgraded to Pro and the results were amazing. The support is also very responsive!
